title: The Parable of the Wedding Banquet
itunes:title: The Parable of the Wedding Banquet
description: Many devout believers find the parable of the wedding feast in the Gospel of Matthew difficult to understand. The story is meant to stir us up with its exaggeration, to signal the spiritual destruction that follows from refusing the divine invitation. We are meant to see how valuable an invitation we have received and how odd it is that we would choose to reject it.

We are meant to see how valuable an invitation we have received and how odd it is that we would choose to reject it.
